headline: 1 Semiconductor Stock with Exciting Potential and 2 We Question
summary: Semiconductors are the core infrastructure powering the Information Age. The amount of data we ingest is also increasing exponentially, leading to elevated demand for chips with more processing power. This secular trend bodes well for the industry, which has posted a six-month gain of 46.4% and beat the S&P 500 by 31.1 percentage points.
